name: Brasov
fun_fact: Fun fact: Sarmale (stuffed cabbage rolls) is so beloved in Romania that it's prepared for every major celebration - Christmas, birthdays, weddings - and Transylvanian families have passed down their secret recipes for generations!

hero_dishes.name: Sarmale
hero_dishes.description: Cabbage leaves stuffed with ground meat, rice, and spices, served with sour cream
hero_dishes.origin_story: Romania's unofficial national dish, essential for special occasions
